en-US.Click or drag files to this area to uplo: Click or drag files to this area to upload
en-US.restore-confirm: The uploaded backup archive appears to be valid and contains the files listed below. Press "{0}" to restore the backup and reboot, or "{1}" to abort the operation.
en-US.The uploaded backup archive is not reada: The uploaded backup archive is not readable
en-US.ResettConfirm: Do you really want to erase all settings

zh-CN.Click or drag files to this area to uplo: 点击或者拖动文件到该区域来上传
zh-CN.restore-confirm: 上传的备份归档有效，并且包含以下列出的文件。点击“{0}”恢复备份并重新启动，或点击“{1}”中止操作。
zh-CN.The uploaded backup archive is not reada: 无法读取上传的备份归档
zh-CN.ResettConfirm: 您确定要清除所有设置吗

zh-TW.Click or drag files to this area to uplo: 點擊或者拖動文件到該區域來上傳
zh-TW.restore-confirm: 上傳的備份檔無效且包含下列檔案。按「{0}」來還原備份並重啟，或「{1}」以終止動作。
zh-TW.The uploaded backup archive is not reada: 上傳的復原檔案無法讀取
zh-TW.ResettConfirm: 您確定要清除所有設定
